statements: SELECT * FROM BlockchainTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address, amount, timestamp FROM BlockchainTransactions;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount, timestamp, transaction_id FROM BlockchainTransactions;
SELECT * FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%abc%' AND recipient_address NOT LIKE '%def%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BlockchainTransactions GROUP BY sender_address, recipient_address HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, timestamp FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sharding_nodes WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT node_id, node_address, shard_id FROM sharding_nodes ORDER BY shard_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789' AND receiver_address = '0xABCDEFGHI' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT shard_id FROM sharding_nodes WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY shard_id;
SELECT node_address, shard_id FROM sharding_nodes WHERE node_id IN (UUID('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'), UUID('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'));
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions JOIN sharding_nodes ON blockchain_transactions.sender_address = sharding_nodes.node_address ORDER BY blockchain_transactions.transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sharded_blocks;
SELECT block_id, shard_id, block_height FROM sharded_blocks WHERE shard_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM sharded_blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT shard_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY shard_id;
SELECT * FROM sharded_blocks WHERE shard_id = 1;
SELECT block_id, block_height, timestamp FROM sharded_blocks ORDER BY block_height DESC;
SELECT shard_id, shard_capacity FROM shards WHERE shard_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000.0 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT block_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE sender_address <> receiver_address ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT shard_id, num_blocks FROM Shards WHERE replication_factor > 2;
SELECT block_id, shard_id FROM ShardMapping WHERE mapping_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM Transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT block_id, COUNT(*) FROM Transactions GROUP BY block_id;
SELECT * FROM Blocks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT shard_id, replication_factor FROM Shards WHERE num_blocks > 50;
SELECT * FROM shard_1;
SELECT block_number, transaction_count FROM shard_2 WHERE shard_key = 'A';
SELECT MAX(transaction_count) AS max_transaction_count FROM shard_3;
SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM shard_4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM shard_5 WHERE transaction_count > 1000;
SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM shard_1;
SELECT * FROM shard_2 WHERE transaction_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_number, shard_key FROM shard_3 WHERE transaction_count < 50;
SELECT block_number, transaction_count FROM shard_4 WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shard_5 WHERE shard_key = 'abc' ORDER BY block_number ASC;
